content: It's unclear to me whether significant debuginfo changes need an MCP. Should we document a policy here?
a recent example is #85020, which I thought was an improvement in the end, but admit I felt uneasy about approving unilaterally
it involved decisions like "actually _captured_ref__b feels a little verbose to me, how about just _ref__b"
I would also like to have some way of pinging debuginfo stakeholders which are often folks not on any official team but with special expertise in downstream tooling
a way of getting multiple eyes on it in general really
I suppose I could have nominated it for discussion
